forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 19C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 67F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 68F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High near 60F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.
